alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 1:23PM CDT until November 04 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GRAYSON COUNTY... At 122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Randell Lake, or 12 miles north of Sherman, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Pottsboro, Bells, Knollwood, Randell Lake, Eisenhower State Park, Valley Lake, Lake Texoma, Preston, Southmayd, Boddie and Carpenters Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
